titleStmt.title: An invitation of love to the hungry & thirsty who truly hunger after the food of life, and a call (to such) to come (from off the barren mountains and from feeding upon vanity) into the everlasting kingdom and house of my father where the least of his servants have bread enough : with some information of the way which leads thereunto / given forth according to the movings of the spirit of the Lord in his servant Iosiah Coal.
titleStmt.author: Coale, Josiah, 1632?-1668.

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of original in the Harvard University Library.
